sentences.en: Look at picture of cannonball flight and you will see they will describe it like this , as though at the end of the flight its dropping almost vertically.
sentences.cn: 仔细看下炮弹的飞行路线,你会发现它们是这样运动的，但是炮弹在最后的落地阶段几乎是垂直的。

sentences.en: Shoot the red ball with a humanoid cannonball.
sentences.cn: 你要用人形炮弹设计红色的球.

sentences.en: Show you it takes to knock outwith crazy power - ups like and Human Cannonball.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过许多疯狂的道具像是人类炮弹来赢得这场“战斗”.

sentences.en: Stuyvesant's right leg amputated after a cannonball during a battle with the Spanish three years earlier.
sentences.cn: 三年前,在与西班牙人的战斗中他的右腿不幸中弹,不得不截去.

sentences.en: Suddenly , a sporadic cannonball bombed in the battle field.
sentences.cn: 敌人已经在城下骂阵了,我们却还是按兵不动.

sentences.en: There are exceptions to this rule: The cannonball jellyfish—a seafood delicacy in Asia—shoots through the water at 15 centimeters per second, a decent clip.
sentences.cn: 当然也有例外，比如亚洲的一种美味海鲜“炮弹水母”，就能以每秒15厘米的速度在水中穿梭，看起来像把水流剪开一样。

sentences.en: This cosmic cannonball is challenging theories to explain its blistering speed.
sentences.cn: 这个宇宙加农炮正在挑战解释其起泡速度的理论.

sentences.en: When the soldier is hit by a cannonball, rags are as becoming as purple.
sentences.cn: 当士兵中了炮弹, 烂军装也宛如高贵的紫袍.

trans.tran_en: a heavy iron ball fired from a cannon
